channel.title: CVE Feed for Rakuten, Inc. -- all

item.title: CVE-2019-6024|2024-08-04T20:16:23.668Z -- rakuten%2C%20inc. -- rakuma%20app
item.description: Rakuma App for Android version 7.15.0 and earlier, and for iOS version 7.16.4 and earlier allows an attacker to bypass authentication and obtain the user's authentication information via a malicious application created by the third party.
